sentences.en: An automobile came tearing along the road.
Automobile accidents are far too common.
Automobile injuries constitute the most common cause for blunt chest injury.
sentences.cn: 汽车撞伤是构成钝性胸部伤的最常见原因.

sentences.en: Factoring in connection with automobile installment accounts is a big business today.
sentences.cn: 代管汽车分期付款的到期帐目是当今一桩巨大的业务.

sentences.en: He is repairing the brake lever of an automobile.
sentences.cn: 他正在修理汽车的刹车杆.

sentences.en: Henry Ford was an automobile baron.
sentences.cn: 亨利·福特是一位汽车业巨头.

sentences.en: I think that it comes down to the fact that people do feel very dependent on their automobile.
sentences.cn: 我认为归根结底就是人们的确十分依赖汽车。

sentences.en: The automobile caused a revolution in our way of traveling.
sentences.cn: 汽车使旅行的方式发生了根本性的变化.

sentences.en: The automobile slowed down to go around the curves in the road.
sentences.cn: 汽车在路上转弯时放慢了速度.
机械师把我们的汽车修好了.

sentences.en: The parts of an automobile are standardized.
sentences.cn: 汽车零件是标准化了的.

sentences.en: The purchaser of this automobile is protected by the manufacturer's warranty.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车的买主可以得到厂方保单.

sentences.en: Today's favoured launching techniques are the airplane tow and the automobile tow.
sentences.cn: 现在常用的起飞方法是用飞机牵引和汽车牵引.

sentences.en: We jacked the automobile in order to change a tire.
sentences.cn: 我们用千斤顶把汽车托起换个轮胎.

sentences.en: You must obtain a new automobile license when your old one expires.
sentences.cn: 当旧的汽车牌照满期,你得领取新的.

words.tran_cn: 使用汽车的人；常用汽车的人

phrases.tran_cn: 汽车产业，汽车业；汽车工业
